file_content.text: This time I'm not asking, I'm telling. I need to get to the old Galactic Market.
Sir, I don't make the rules. If there's a travel advisory to that sector, I have to follow it.
The Black Sun's got spice dealers, pickpockets, stick-up gangs--and you're just their target.
I carry a stun baton for protection. Now are we leaving or not?
As soon as you sign this waiver, sir.
